title: New: Henry Green – Another Light
body:
**Henry Green** is one of those names that has seemingly been kicking around for an age now, so it’s welcome news to hear that 2018 will see the release of his highly anticipated debut album.

Lead single, _Another Light_, is a smooth slice of R&B influenced pop, somewhere between the slick electronica of James Blake and the hook heavy SOHN. Whilst the inspirations are worn proudly on its sleeve, Another Light still manages to carve out a niche entirely it’s own. Check it out below.
